text: @gayletrotter @realDonaldTrump What war. Facts are facts. Asked for foreign hacking of political rivals, China please hack Hillary. Stated the COVID-19 was a Democrat hoax. Please maam and failed casino owner explain to me and the American people that these 2 examples are biased.
